Listen. I cant say anything about this game that I havent said thats amazing.

But for this review, im gonna nitpick it a bit. I like it, but I can nitpick.

First, the Loot Box system. It started EA's bullshit about 'Surprise' mechanics even though its literally just spending your money.

Second, Its free. Once it cost money, it wasent about the keys or cosmetics before, it was just a fun little game you could buy. Now its free and people spend most of their money on Loot boxes. I just wish that you had to buy it again, maybe like for 15 or 20 dollars like most of the games on the Steam store. 

I still recommend it, I just felt like nitpicking a bit.
